common.errorDescription: We encountered an unexpected error. Please try again or return to the home page.
common.notFoundDescription: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.

home.title: Home page
home.heroSubtitle: Automate your content creation with AI-powered stream clipping for TikTok and Instagram
home.feature1Description: Our AI automatically detects the most engaging moments in your streams and creates perfect clips
home.feature2Description: Export your clips directly to TikTok and Instagram with optimized formats and hashtags
home.feature3Description: Track your clip performance and get insights to improve your content strategy
home.step1Description: Link your Twitch, YouTube, or other streaming platform account
home.step2Description: Our AI analyzes your stream and identifies viral moments
home.step3Description: Review and customize the suggested clips with our easy editor
home.step4Description: Export to TikTok and Instagram with one click
home.platformDescription: Join our community of content creators and streamers
home.platformFeature1Description: Share your work, get feedback, and connect with other creators
home.platformFeature2Description: Offer your streams for clipping and earn from your content
home.platformFeature3Description: Connect with professional clippers who can help grow your audience
home.blockchainDescription: Secure, transparent, and efficient content monetization
home.blockchainFeature1Description: Automated payments and revenue sharing between creators and clippers
home.blockchainFeature2Description: Prove your ownership and track usage of your content
home.blockchainFeature3Description: Real-time tracking of your earnings and analytics
home.ctaDescription: Join thousands of content creators who are already using Rocket to grow their audience
